import _toConsumableArray from"@babel/runtime/helpers/esm/toConsumableArray";import{isSame}from"../utils/dateUtil";/**
 * Toggles the presence of a value in an array.
 * If the value exists in the array, removed it.
 * Else add it.
 */export default function useToggleDates(generateConfig,locale,panelMode){function toggleDates(list,target){var index=list.findIndex(function(date){return isSame(generateConfig,locale,date,target,panelMode);});if(index===-1){return[].concat(_toConsumableArray(list),[target]);}var sliceList=_toConsumableArray(list);sliceList.splice(index,1);return sliceList;}return toggleDates;}
